articles.title: China silences prominent market analyst as economic slump deepens - CNN
articles.description: Chinese social media have shut down the accounts of a prominent market analyst who drew attention in recent weeks to the dramatic slowdown in the country's economy and the effects of government policy on the tech industry.

articles.title: Spirit rejects JetBlue's offer, saying it wants to be bought by Frontier - CNN
articles.description: Spirit Airlines said it will stick with its deal to be purchased by Frontier Airlines, rejecting a more lucrative competing offer from JetBlue Airways.
